name: player(_:receivedExchangeReplies:forCompletedExchange:for:)
desc: Handles when all recipients of an exchange request respond.
declaration:
optional func player(_ player: GKPlayer, 
receivedExchangeReplies replies: [GKTurnBasedExchangeReply], 
forCompletedExchange exchange: GKTurnBasedExchange, 
                 for match: GKTurnBasedMatch)
